title: Display profile names instead of 'Anonymous' for forum message authors

requirements.summary: Update forum message display to show author's saved profile name from authorName field instead of 'Anonymous' for users with profiles
acceptanceCriteria: Forum messages in the Section Detail page display the author's profile name when `authorName` is available
Messages without an `authorName` (null or empty string) display 'Anonymous' as the fallback
Principal IDs are never shown to end users in the message author display

file_operations.description: Update the message rendering logic to display the author's profile name from the `authorName` field when available. Replace the current 'Anonymous' display logic with a conditional check: if `authorName` exists and is non-empty, display it; otherwise, display 'Anonymous' as the fallback. Ensure principal IDs are never shown to end users in the message author display area.
